channel.title: CBP Border Wait Times
channel.description: Estimated wait times for reaching the primary inspection booth, the first point of contact with CBP when crossing the Canada/U.S. and Mexico/U.S. land borders. Each border location updates its estimated wait times hourly.

item.title: El Paso - Bridge of the Americas (BOTA)
item.description: Hours Date Lane type Max lanes Standard Lanes Special Lanes Border Notice 24 hrs/day 3/27/2025 Commercial Vehicles 6 General Lanes: Lanes Closed Fast Lanes: Lanes Closed 24 hrs/day 3/27/2025 Passenger Vehicles 14 General Lanes: At 10:00 pm MDT 22 min delay 1 lane(s) open Sentri Lanes: N/A Ready Lanes: At 10:00 pm MDT 20 min delay 2 lane(s) open 24 hrs/day 3/27/2025 Pedestrian 6 General Lanes: At 10:00 pm MDT 2 min delay 2 lane(s) open Ready Lanes: Lanes Closed BOTA Passenger/Ready Lanes is open west side of port; Passenger Hrs 24 hours/7days, BOTA CARGO Mon-FRI 6 am to 4 pm. SAT/SUN CLOSED. Tune into AM 1610 for info.

item.title: El Paso - Paso Del Norte (PDN)
item.description: Hours Date Lane type Max lanes Standard Lanes Special Lanes Border Notice 24 hrs/day 3/27/2025 24 hrs/day 3/27/2025 Passenger Vehicles 12 General Lanes: At 9:00 pm MDT 14 min delay 2 lane(s) open Sentri Lanes: At 9:00 pm MDT 0 min delay 1 lane(s) open Ready Lanes: At 9:00 pm MDT 10 min delay 4 lane(s) open 24 hrs/day 3/27/2025 Pedestrian 14 General Lanes: At 9:00 pm MDT 1 min delay 3 lane(s) open Ready Lanes: At 9:00 pm MDT 1 min delay 3 lane(s) open Ready Lanes are open at PDN. See www.getyouhome.gov for more information. Tune in to AM 1620 for border crossing information.

item.title: El Paso - Stanton DCL
item.description: Hours Date Lane type Max lanes Standard Lanes Special Lanes Border Notice 6 am-Midnight 3/27/2025 6 am-Midnight 3/27/2025 Passenger Vehicles 3 General Lanes: Lanes Closed Sentri Lanes: At 9:00 pm MDT 1 min delay 1 lane(s) open Ready Lanes: N/A 6 am-Midnight 3/27/2025 Be prepared for construction that may cause some delays in the southbound lanes of the Stanton bridge; early January - February. Tune in to AM 1620 for border crossing information.

item.title: El Paso - Ysleta

SAT 6 am to 2 pm. Tune into AM 1610 for info.
